H0.text: The liver is the organ in which most absorption of nutrients takes place.

H1.text: Stomach is the organ in which most absorption of nutrients takes place.

H2.text: Small intestine is the organ where most absorption of nutrients takes place.

H3.text: The large intestine is the organ in which most absorption of nutrients takes place.

A4.text: The small intestine is the site where most of the nutrients from ingested food are absorbed.

A5.text: Absorption of the majority of nutrients takes place in the jejunum.
